name: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
desc: Flags for simulating combination keystrokes with keys, such as Control, Option, Shift, and Command.

items.name: static var command: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Command key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: static var control: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Control key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: static var option: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Option key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: static var shift: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Shift key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: static var capsLock: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Caps Lock key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: static var function: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Function (Fn) key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a flag that represents a key in a combination keystroke with the specified raw value.

items.name: static var alphaShift: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Caps Lock key in a combination keystroke.

items.name: static var alternate: XCUIElement.KeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The Option key in a combination keystroke.
